offlabel-antrag.title: Off-label application
offlabel-antrag.description: Capture an off-label application with core data and request details for insurer and doctor.
offlabel-antrag.section.patient.title: Patient
offlabel-antrag.section.doctor.title: Doctor
offlabel-antrag.section.insurer.title: Insurer
offlabel-antrag.section.request.title: Application
offlabel-antrag.section.doctorSupport.he: Optional: Support letter for the doctor and, if needed, doctor signature on letter 1.
offlabel-antrag.patient.firstName.label: First name
offlabel-antrag.patient.firstName.help: Optional first name of the applicant
offlabel-antrag.patient.lastName.label: Last name
offlabel-antrag.patient.lastName.help: Optional last name of the applicant
offlabel-antrag.patient.birthDate.label: Birth date
offlabel-antrag.patient.postalCode.label: Postal code
offlabel-antrag.patient.city.label: City
offlabel-antrag.doctor.name.label: Name
offlabel-antrag.doctor.practice.label: Practice

offlabel-antrag.doctor.city.label: City

offlabel-antrag.insurer.department.label: Department
offlabel-antrag.insurer.postalCode.label: Postal code
offlabel-antrag.insurer.city.label: City
offlabel-antrag.request.drug.label: Medication
offlabel-antrag.request.indicationFreeTe: Free text for the medical rationale
offlabel-antrag.request.standardOfCareTr: Which standard treatments were already used?
offlabel-antrag.request.doctorRationaleF: Optional text block for doctor-specific rationale
offlabel-antrag.request.doctorSupport.en: Enable this when a support letter to the doctor is needed.
offlabel-antrag.request.doctorSupport.do: If enabled, letter 1 is intended to be signed by the doctor.
offlabel-antrag.attachmentsFreeText.help: One attachment per line, e.g. doctor letter, findings, lab results.
